Interface_name: HTTP Client - side based on request in javascript
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a JavaScript class for interacting with the Cryptsy cryptocurrency exchange API, handling both public and private endpoints with proper authentication and request management.

Class Description: The Cryptsy class provides a wrapper for the Cryptsy API, enabling users to make authenticated requests to private endpoints and public data requests. It handles API authentication, request signing, and response processing.

Attributes:
- key: string - API key for authentication
- secret: string - API secret for request signing
- PUBLIC_API_URL: string - Base URL for public API endpoints (default: 'http://pubapi.cryptsy.com/api.php')
- PRIVATE_API_URL: string - Base URL for private API endpoints (default: 'https://api.cryptsy.com/api')
- USER_AGENT: string - User agent string for requests (default: 'nomp/node-open-mining-portal')
- STRICT_SSL: boolean - Static flag for SSL verification (default: true)

Methods:
- constructor(key, secret) -> Cryptsy - Initializes the API client with credentials
- _getPrivateHeaders(parameters: object) -> object - Generates authentication headers for private requests
- _request(options: object, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Base request method with common configuration
- _public(parameters: object, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Makes public API requests
- _private(parameters: object, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Makes authenticated private API requests
- getTicker(callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Gets market ticker data
- getOrderBook(currencyA: string, currencyB: string, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Gets order book for a currency pair
- getTradeHistory(currencyA: string, currencyB: string, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Gets public trade history
- myBalances(callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Gets user's account balances
- myOpenOrders(currencyA: string, currencyB: string, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Gets user's open orders
- myTradeHistory(currencyA: string, currencyB: string, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Gets user's trade history
- buy(currencyA: string, currencyB: string, rate: number, amount: number, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Places a buy order
- sell(currencyA: string, currencyB: string, rate: number, amount: number, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Places a sell order
- cancelOrder(currencyA: string, currencyB: string, orderNumber: string, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Cancels an order
- withdraw(currency: string, amount: number, address: string, callback: function) -> Cryptsy - Withdraws funds
- _joinCurrencies(currencyA: string, currencyB: string) -> string - Helper to format currency pairs
